name: NUNYOCOMPANY
0:
”Alexa, open NUNYO COMPANY”
”Alexa, start NUNYO COMPANY”
”Alexa, ask NUNYO COMPANY”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: nunyo company
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Biographical conversations, and a touch of comedy, with renowned or influential figures. Nunyo Demasio — an award-winning journalist, New York Times bestselling author and budding comedy writer — engages his distinguished guests about their careers, indispensable life lessons and topical subjects. One staple of the show is that each figure offers a joke, grades a few by the host and reveals a favorite comedian. Articles based on each episode will appear on Apple News.

Here are a few quick tips when navigating our skill. The First thing to note, when opening the skill you’ll be playing the latest episode, but if that’s not what you’re looking for, you can always find something more specific. This skill allows you to play next or previous episode. In addition, you can ask the skill to play the newest or oldest episodes or if you want to get specific, play a specific episode by saying the episode number. Try some of these commands:

**Search Via Episode**
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, ask NUNYO COMPANY to play episode "xyz"”

**Next/Previous Episode**
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, next”
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, previous”

**Select Latest Episode**
— “Alexa, ask NUNYO COMPANY to play latest episode” 

**Select First Episode**
— “Alexa, ask NUNYO COMPANY to start from first episode”
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
